meanings.definition: Covered in or smelling of dung
meanings.sent1: The dungiest farm had a strong smell of manure.
meanings.sent2: The pigpen was the dungiest area on the farm.
meanings.sent3: The dungiest corner of the barn made the cows sneeze.
meanings.sent4: After the rain, the streets were the dungiest they had ever been.
meanings.sent5: The dungiest field was avoided by the villagers due to the foul odor.

meanings.sent1: The dungiest pig was awarded first place at the fair.
meanings.sent2: The dungiest room in the house was the basement.
meanings.sent3: The dungiest dog in the park rolled happily in the mud.
meanings.sent4: The dungiest alley in town was a haven for stray cats.
meanings.sent5: The dungiest clothes were left out to air in the sun.
